job.title: Entry Level Software Engineer
job.description: pTitle Entry Level Software EngineerppstrongnbspstrongppJob Description ppGeeknbspNerdnbspLearn a programming language before you learned a foreign language You are in good company and wed like to talk to younbspCome geek out with us and make a difference while you learnnbspWe have a scrappy startup feel with large company benefits and securityppnbspppstrongOur Ideal CandidatestrongppWe are looking for a passionate and tech knowledge hungry entry level software engineer that can grow with usnbspThe ideal candidate will have early career programming skills and be proficient in one or more of the following languages C C Java Maybe some ASPNET javascripthtmlcss sprinkled innbspThe individual participates in all phases of the software development and delivery process ppnbspppWe are looking for entry level C Web developers with the following qualificationsstrong strongppstrongEntry Level Software Engineer ResponsibilitiesstrongpulliLearn the technologies languages and practices used by the teamliliDevelop SaaS solutions in NET C SQL Angular and various API librariesliliParticipate in Scrum activitiesliliParticipate in code reviewsliliWork as part of the Scrum team or with the ability to act independently as neededliliCollaborate and communicate effectively with team members and other departments within the companyliliEnsure assigned technical tasks are being delivered on time and with qualityliliProvide production support and debugging for our production applicationsliulpstrongEntry Level Software Engineer QualificationsstrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspCollege degree Associates or BachelorsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspDemonstratable history of curiosity and innovation ppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspStrong desire to learn to code  No prior professional experience requiredppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspA natural problem solverppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspStrong communication and interpersonal skillsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspMust be authorized to work in the US US Citizen or Green Card holderppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAgile development of SaaS solutions Preferredppbrpp strongAbout usstrongppGSM is on a mission to make the workplace and the environment safer by simplifying compliance and chemical product documentationppWith roots as a regulatory professional services provider for the chemical industry GSM developed a transformational approach to SDS authoring that focused on a limited universe of chemical hazards rather than chemical ingredients avoiding the need to review a potentially infinite number of ingredient combinations Our team consists of regulatory compliance experts that are ready to support you and your unique needsppstrongCompensation and BenefitsstrongppCompetitive salaries and excellent benefits are provided after a minimum waiting period Some of our benefits include 401k vacation paid holidays comprehensive health and dental plan company paid short amp long term disability and life insurance Join our team in Tampa FL for a rewarding career ppemGlobal Safety Management is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to diversity and values the ways in which we are different All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability veteran status or other characteristic protected by applicable lawemppnbspppbrp
